name: Mindset Mastery
reflectionPrompt: Where do I need more discipline—and what’s the smallest proof today?
majorMove: Write one Anchor Thought for tough moments; repeat it 3x today.

name: Entrepreneurial Skill-Building
reflectionPrompt: What problem am I excited to solve—and who already has it?
majorMove: Block 60 minutes and outline one simple offer (who, what, price, next step).

name: Cultural Connection & Identity
reflectionPrompt: What part of my heritage gives me strength right now?
majorMove: Write a 10-line origin story and share it with one trusted person.

name: Physical Vitality
reflectionPrompt: What movement makes me feel most alive—and why?
majorMove: Do 15 minutes of movement today and log how you feel after.

name: Nutritional Resilience
reflectionPrompt: What food habit is stealing my energy the most?
majorMove: Replace one processed item today with a whole-food alternative.

name: Digital Wealth Creation
reflectionPrompt: What do I know that could help 100 people this week?
majorMove: Outline a 1-page digital product: title + 3 benefits + who it’s for.

name: Community Connection & Networking
reflectionPrompt: Who are 3 people I should strengthen relationship with this week?
majorMove: Send 3 genuine check-ins today (no ask, just value).

name: Wisdom & Storytelling
reflectionPrompt: What lesson did life teach me the hard way that could help others?
majorMove: Record a 60-second voice note: “Here’s what I learned…”

name: Forgiveness & Gratitude
reflectionPrompt: What am I still carrying that costs me energy daily?
majorMove: Write a forgiveness letter (not sent). End: “I release you.”

name: Creative Expression
reflectionPrompt: What wants to come through me creatively right now?
majorMove: Create for 30 minutes uninterrupted; share a tiny snippet.
